mapper.sql: institutionsid, regionid, institutionsname, institutionscode, responsible, telephone, address, employeecount, applydate, approvaldate, state, applyemail
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_institutions where isdeleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_institutions (institutionsid, regionid, institutionsname, institutionscode, responsible, telephone, address, employeecount, applydate, approvaldate, state, applyemail) values (#{institutionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{institutionsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institutionscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approvaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

institutionsid,
regionid,
institutionsname,
institutionscode,
responsible,
telephone,

applydate,

state,

mapper.update:
update t_institutions
regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
institutionsname = #{institutionsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
institutionscode = #{institutionscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employeecount = #{employeecount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applydate = #{applydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approvaldate = #{approvaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where institutionsid = #{institutionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_institutions set regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, institutionsname = #{institutionsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institutionscode = #{institutionscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employeecount = #{employeecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applydate = #{applydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approvaldate = #{approvaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where institutionsid = #{institutionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
